reviewText:
haha just a heads up: read that product listing carefully!! this absolutely does not work in the U.S. but they will still ship it there! these are useless to own in the United States! do not buy if you live in the USA!

(afaik the discs work somewhere else, presumably England, and this show rules so im still giving it five stars)

Dislike the way the product appear at first as a dvd that was useable. Anywhere. After you select it, it show not useable in the USA. Im mostpoeple are like me who does stop, after its selected, read the description. Plus they wouldnt pay for return shipment.
Fast shipping! Happy to see that bonus scenes and extras are included in this set! Thank you!
